description:
Extension for Desktop and Mobile Firefox saves information about the current web page and any active text selection.

These time-stamped entries can be downloaded in timeclock file format.

Context menu entry on Android is only avaliable on hyperlinks, because text selection is mutually exclusive with context a menu there.
name: snapper

preferences.name: DATEFORMAT
preferences.description: Set Snapper Date and Time Format (%Y = Year, %m = Month, %d = Day, %H = Hour, %M = Minute, %S = Second, %z = Timezone Offset).
preferences.title: DATE FORMAT

preferences.name: INFOFORMAT
preferences.description: Set Snapper Information Format (%u = URL, %t = title, %s = selection).
preferences.title: INFORMATION FORMAT

title: Snapper
